AUTOUPDATE_UPGRADE: A new version {{ version }} is available
BETACHANNEL: Use Nuxeo Drive update beta channel
CONFIRM_UPDATE_MESSAGE: About to update to {{update_channel}} version {{ version }}
CONFLICT_ON_FILE: The file „{{ name }}“ has a conflict
CONNECTION_ERROR: Connection error: please check server URL
CONNECTION_UNKNOWN: Unknown error occured while trying to connect
CREATE_REPORT: Click to generate a bug report
DELETE_READONLY_DOCUMENT: Mark „{{ name }}“ filtered as it is in read-only mode
DIRECT_EDIT_CANT_FIND_ENGINE: Cannot find the binding for the user {{ user }} on the server {{ server }}.
DIRECT_EDIT_CONFLICT_MESSAGE: The document „{{ name }}“ was modified remotely and is now in conflict. What do you want to do?
DIRECT_EDIT_INVALID_CREDS:
Invalid credentials for the user {{ user }} on the server {{ server }}.

Please go to Settings and enter valid information.
DIRECT_EDIT_LOCKED_FILE: Cannot edit „{{ name }}“ as it was locked by {{ lock_owner }} on {{ lock_created }}
DIRECT_EDIT_LOCK_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The document „{{ name }}“ was not locked
DIRECT_EDIT_READONLY_FILE: Cannot edit „{{ name }}“ as it is read-only
DIRECT_EDIT_UNLOCK_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The document „{{ name }}“ was not unlocked
DIRECT_EDIT_UPDATED_FILE: The file „{{ name }}“ has been updated
DRIVE_ROOT_DELETED: The synchronization folder „{{ folder }}“ of Nuxeo Drive has been deleted. Would you like to disconnect from the server or do you want to recreate it?
DRIVE_ROOT_MOVED: The synchronization folder „{{ folder }}“ of Nuxeo Drive has been moved to „{{ new_folder }}“. Would you like to update the synchronization location, recreate the folder or disconnect?
ENGINE_BETA: You have configured a beta engine. You can experience some issues and we would appreciate your feedback.
ERROR_ON_FILE: The document „{{ name }}“ is in error
ERROR_REASON_READONLY: The document could not be uploaded on the server because it or its parent is in read-only.
ERROR_REASON_DEDUP: A remote document with the same name exists, but siblings are forbidden. Either contact the contributor to change the name of the document or change your local name and retry.
ERROR_REASON_CORRUPT: Failed to download the file because we cannot verify its integrity. Either the remote file has a bad check sum and a sysadmin must take care of it, either you should retry the download.
ERROR_REASON_UNKNOWN: This document is in error for unknown reason
FILTERS_DISABLED: You must wait for current synchronisation actions to be done before filtering some folders.
FOLDER_USED: Folder already used by another Nuxeo Drive account
IGNORE_REASON_CORRUPT: This file is ignored because its integrity cannot be verified.
IGNORE_REASON_DEDUP: This document is ignored because of an existing duplicate
IGNORE_REASON_LOCKED: This file is locked, it will lead to a conflict if the file is modified remotely
IGNORE_REASON_MANUAL: This file was in error, and has been ignored manually
IGNORE_REASON_PARENT_UNSYNC: This file is ignored as its parent is also ignored
IGNORE_REASON_READONLY: This file or its parent is in read-only
IGNORE_REASON_UNKNOWN: This file is ignored for unknown reason
INVALID_PARTITION: This type of partition is not supported
LOCKED_FILE: Cannot update „{{ name }}“ as it was locked by {{ lock_owner }} on {{ lock_created }}
LOCK_NOTIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: The document „{{ name }}“ has been locked
METADATA_FILE_NOT_HANDLE: This file is not handled by the Nuxeo server or is not synchronized yet.
NAME: Name
NOTIF_DELETION_DIFFERENT_ACCOUNT: „{{ name }}“ has obsolete metadata and does not exist on the server; moving to the trash.
NO_CONFLICTS_BODY: You have resolved all conflicts and errors
NO_SPACE_LEFT_ON_DEVICE: No space left on device, please free some disk space.
READONLY_FILE: Cannot update „{{ name }}“ as it is read-only
READONLY_FOLDER: „{{ name }}“ could not be uploaded to read-only folder „{{ folder }}“
ROOT_USED_WITH_OTHER_BINDING: This folder has been used by {{ username }}, its content will be deleted. Do you want to continue? If no, click on Cancel and choose another folder.
SELECT_SYNC_FOLDERS_DESCRIPTION: Allows you to choose which folders to sync locally. This requires the engine to be online.
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Set your account and synchronize your files with the Nuxeo Platform.
WINDOWS_ERROR_OPENED_FILE: The file „{{ name }}“ is open by another software. Please close it before Nuxeo Drive can process the deletion from your local storage.
WINDOWS_ERROR_OPENED_FOLDER: The folder „{{ name }}“ or its children is locked by another software. Please close it before Nuxeo Drive can process the deletion from your local storage.
DELETION_ERROR_MSG: The document „{{ name }}“ cannot be unsynchronised because its full path is too long.
